mapper.insert: insert into tbl_guest(member_id, guest_phone, guest_order_number, address_zip_code, address_detail, address) values (#{memberId},#{guestPhone},#{guestOrderNumber},#{addressZipCode},#{addressDetail},#{address})
mapper.select: SELECT id, member_id AS memberId, guest_phone AS guestPhone, guest_order_number AS guestOrderNumber, address_zip_code AS addressZipCode, address_detail AS addressDetail, address FROM tbl_guest WHERE id = #{guestId}

SELECT g.id AS guestId, g.guest_phone AS guestPhone, g.address_zip_code AS guestZipCode, g.address AS guestAddress, g.address_detail AS guestAddressDetail, g.guest_order_number AS guestOrderNumber,
ps.payment_phase AS paymentStatus, ps.created_datetime AS paymentCreated, ps.updated_datetime AS paymentUpdated,
p.id AS postId, p.post_title AS postTitle,
pu.purchase_product_price AS purchaseProductPrice, pu.purchase_country AS purchaseCountry, pu.purchase_delivery_method AS purchaseDeliveryMethod,
m.id AS memberId, m.member_name AS memberName, m.member_phone AS memberPhone, m.member_email AS memberEmail,
f.file_path || '/' || f.file_name AS mainImage FROM tbl_guest g JOIN tbl_payment_status ps ON g.id = ps.guest_id JOIN tbl_purchase pu ON ps.purchase_id = pu.post_id JOIN tbl_post p ON pu.post_id = p.id JOIN tbl_member m ON ps.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_section s ON p.id = s.post_id LEFT JOIN tbl_post_section_file sf ON s.id = sf.post_section_id AND sf.image_type = 'main' LEFT JOIN tbl_file f ON sf.file_id = f.id WHERE g.guest_order_number = #{guestOrderNumber}
